p: The fruits of Piper capense used in this work were purchased at the Dschang local market (5°27′N 10°04′E) in April 2018 (Menoua division of the West region of Cameroon). The plant was subsequently identified and authenticated at the National Herbarium of Cameroon (NHC), Yaoundé, where a sample was deposited and registered under reference number 6018/SRF-Cam.
